A Call into the Void.objective:
Kill a rare Talon Archer in one of the following locations:
* Map - Pit
* Map - Museum
* Map - Promenade
* Map - Catacomb
* Map - Cells
* Map - Castle Ruins
* Map - Colosseum
* Map - Maze
* Map - Waterways
A Call into the Void.reward: Talon Archer will drop "Voltaxic Rift (Spine Bow)" upon slaying.
A Call into the Void.text: You will track down a powerful Talon Archer in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

A Dishonourable Death.objective: Kill The Dishonoured Queen in The Mud Flats (Act 6) while holding a "Hyrri's Bite (Sharktooth Arrow Quiver)". Holding means equipping the quiver, or having the quiver in the player inventory
A Dishonourable Death.reward: Upgrades "Hyrri's Bite (Sharktooth Arrow Quiver)" to "Hyrri's Demise (Sharktooth Arrow Quiver)" upon completion.
A Dishonourable Death.text: You will defeat The Dishonoured Queen while holding Hyrri's Bite.

A Firm Foothold.objective:
Kill a rare Seething Brine in one of the following locations:
* Act 1 - The Ship Graveyard
* Act 1 - The Ship Graveyard Cave
A Firm Foothold.reward: Seething Brine will drop "Wanderlust (Wool Shoes)" upon slaying.
A Firm Foothold.text: You will track down a powerful Seething Brine who will drop a unique item when slain.

A Forest of False Idols.objective: Kill Torchoak Grove in Kaom's Dream while wearing a "Araku Tiki (Coral Amulet)" or or holding it in the player inventory.
A Forest of False Idols.reward: Upgrades "Araku Tiki (Coral Amulet)" to "Ngamahu Tiki (Coral Amulet)" upon completion.
A Forest of False Idols.text: You will defeat Torchoak Grove while holding Araku Tiki.

A Gracious Master.reward: Triples the favour granted by that Master's mission.
A Gracious Master.text: You will complete a Master's mission and will receive triple favour.

A Master Seeks Help (Alva).text: You will find Alva and complete her mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Catarina).reward: Increases reputation and favour gained by 100% for that mission.
A Master Seeks Help (Catarina).text: You will find Alva and complete her mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Einhar).text: You will find Einhar and complete his mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Elreon).reward: Increases reputation and favour gained by 100% for that mission.
A Master Seeks Help (Elreon).text: You will find Niko and complete his mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Haku).reward: Increases reputation and favour gained by 100% for that mission.
A Master Seeks Help (Haku).text: You will find Einhar and complete his mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Jun).text: You will find Jun and complete her mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Niko).text: You will find Niko and complete his mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Tora).reward: Increases reputation and favour gained by 100% for that mission.
A Master Seeks Help (Tora).text: You will find Einhar and complete his mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Vagan).reward: Increases reputation and favour gained by 100% for that mission.
A Master Seeks Help (Vagan).text: You will find Alva and complete her mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Vorici).reward: Increases reputation and favour gained by 100% for that mission.
A Master Seeks Help (Vorici).text: You will find Niko and complete his mission.

A Master Seeks Help (Zana).text: You will find Zana and complete her mission.

A Prodigious Hand.objective:
Kill a rare Sutured Aberration in one of the following locations:
* Act 2 - The Chamber of Sins Level 1
* Act 7 - The Chamber of Sins Level 1
* Act 7 - The Chamber of Sins Level 2
* Act 8 - The Toxic Conduits
A Prodigious Hand.reward: Sutured Aberration will drop "Maligaro's Virtuosity (Deerskin Gloves)" upon slaying.
A Prodigious Hand.text: You will track down a powerful Sutured Aberration who will drop a unique item when slain.

A Regal Death.objective:
Kill a King or Queen unique monster.
* Atziri, Queen of the Vaal
* Daresso, King of Swords
* Garukhan, Queen of the Winds
* King Kaom
* Mutated Broodqueen
* Queen of the Great Tangle
* Shakari, Queen of the Sands
* Shivrul Goatqueen
* The Bone Queen
* The Cursed King
* The Dishonoured Queen
* The Fallen Queen
* The Infernal King
* The Sunburst Queen
* The Vulture Queen
* Tsoagoth, The Brine King
* Volkuur, the Unbreathing Queen
A Regal Death.text: You will slay a very powerful king or queen, and it will drop a Regal Orb.

A Rift in Time.objective: Kill Riftwalker in Laboratory Map while holding "Timeclasp (Moonstone Ring)".
A Rift in Time.reward: Upgrades "Timeclasp (Moonstone Ring)" to "Timetwist (Moonstone Ring)" upon completion.
A Rift in Time.text: You will defeat Riftwalker while holding Timeclasp.

A Valuable Combination.reward: You will be given an extra "Chaos Orb".
A Valuable Combination.text: You will receive an extra Chaos Orb from a vendor when you trade items that would result in a Chaos Orb.

A Vision of Ice and Fire.objective: Kill Sumter the Twisted in Estuary Map while holding "Heatshiver (Leather Hood)".
A Vision of Ice and Fire.reward: Upgrades "Heatshiver (Leather Hood)" to "Frostferno (Leather Hood)" upon completion.
A Vision of Ice and Fire.text: You will defeat Sumter the Twisted while holding Heatshiver.

A Whispered Prayer.objective:
Kill a rare Frost Preacher in one of the following locations:
* Act 2 - The Crypt Level 1
* Act 2 - The Crypt Level 2
* Act 3 - The Catacombs
* Act 7 - The Crypt
A Whispered Prayer.reward: Frost Preacher will drop "The Whispering Ice (Vile Staff)" upon slaying.
A Whispered Prayer.text: You will track down a powerful Frost Preacher who will drop a unique item when slain.

Abnormal Effulgence.objective:
Kill a rare Chaos Sentinel in one of the following maps:
* Map - Crystal Ore
* Map - Excavation
Abnormal Effulgence.reward: Chaos Sentinel will drop "Singularity (Platinum Sceptre)" upon slaying.
Abnormal Effulgence.text: You will track down a powerful Chaos Sentinel in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

Against the Tide.objective:
Kill a rare Dockhand Wraith in one of the following locations:
* Act 3 - The Docks
* Act 4 - The Aqueduct
* Act 8 - The Quay
* Map - Pier
* Map - Shipyard
Against the Tide.reward: Dockhand Wraith will drop "Roth's Reach (Recurve Bow)" upon slaying.
Against the Tide.text: You will track down a powerful Dockhand Wraith who will drop a unique item when slain.

Agony at Dusk.objective: Kill Maligaro, The Inquisitor in The Harvest in Act 4 while holding "Dusktoe (Ironscale Boots)".
Agony at Dusk.reward: Upgrades "Dusktoe (Ironscale Boots)" to "Duskblight (Ironscale Boots)" upon completion.
Agony at Dusk.text: You will defeat Maligaro, The Inquisitor while holding Dusktoe.

An Unseen Peril.objective: Open a strongbox. All normal monsters spawned become magic.
An Unseen Peril.text: You will be attacked by stronger than normal monsters when opening a Strongbox.

Anarchy's End I.objective: You will enter a map and slay a Rogue Exile.
Anarchy's End I.reward: [[File:Divination card inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]]Anarchy's Price[[File:Anarchy's Price card art.png|link=|alt=]][[File:Divination card frame.png|link=|alt=]]Anarchy's Price13[[File:Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]]Voltaxic Rift[[File:Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]CorruptedBorn of relentless fury and abhorrence, warped by turmoil and anguish, tainted through desire and carnality, I thirst for bloodshed once more.[[File:Divination card inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]] will drop.
Anarchy's End I.text: You will enter a map and slay a Rogue Exile who is carrying a Divination Card.

Anarchy's End II.objective: You will enter a map and slay two Rogue Exiles.
Anarchy's End II.reward: Two [[File:Divination card inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]]Anarchy's Price[[File:Anarchy's Price card art.png|link=|alt=]][[File:Divination card frame.png|link=|alt=]]Anarchy's Price13[[File:Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]]Voltaxic Rift[[File:Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]CorruptedBorn of relentless fury and abhorrence, warped by turmoil and anguish, tainted through desire and carnality, I thirst for bloodshed once more.[[File:Divination card inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]] will drop.
Anarchy's End II.text: You will enter a map and slay two Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.

Anarchy's End III.objective: You will enter a map and slay three Rogue Exiles.
Anarchy's End III.reward: Three [[File:Divination card inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]]Anarchy's Price[[File:Anarchy's Price card art.png|link=|alt=]][[File:Divination card frame.png|link=|alt=]]Anarchy's Price13[[File:Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]]Voltaxic Rift[[File:Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]CorruptedBorn of relentless fury and abhorrence, warped by turmoil and anguish, tainted through desire and carnality, I thirst for bloodshed once more.[[File:Divination card inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]] will drop.
Anarchy's End III.text: You will enter a map and slay four Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.

Anarchy's End IV.objective: You will enter a map and slay four Rogue Exiles.
Anarchy's End IV.reward: Four [[File:Divination card inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]]Anarchy's Price[[File:Anarchy's Price card art.png|link=|alt=]][[File:Divination card frame.png|link=|alt=]]Anarchy's Price13[[File:Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]]Voltaxic Rift[[File:Voltaxic Rift inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]CorruptedBorn of relentless fury and abhorrence, warped by turmoil and anguish, tainted through desire and carnality, I thirst for bloodshed once more.[[File:Divination card inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]] will drop.
Anarchy's End IV.text: You will enter a map and slay six Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.

Ancient Doom.objective: Kill Vaal Oversoul in Ancient Pyramid while wielding a "Doomfletch (Royal Bow)".
Ancient Doom.reward: Upgrades "Doomfletch (Royal Bow)" to "Doomfletch's Prism (Royal Bow)" upon completion.
Ancient Doom.text: You will defeat the Vaal Oversoul while holding Doomfletch.

Ancient Rivalries I.objective: Kill Brutus while wearing one of Shavronne's items.
Ancient Rivalries I.text: You will slay Brutus while wearing one of Shavronne's items.

Ancient Rivalries II.text: You will slay Voll while wearing one of Doedre's items.

Ancient Rivalries III.objective: Kill King Kaom while wearing one of Lioneye's items.
Ancient Rivalries III.text: You will slay Kaom while wearing one of Lioneye's items.

Ancient Rivalries IV.objective: Kill Malachai while wearing one of Victario's items
Ancient Rivalries IV.text: You will slay Malachai while wearing one of Victario's items.

Baptism by Death.objective:
Kill a rare Death Bishop in one of the following locations:
* Act 2 - The Caverns
* Act 2 - The Ancient Pyramid
* Act 3 - The Catacombs
Baptism by Death.reward: Death Bishop will drop "Geofri's Baptism (Brass Maul)" upon slaying.
Baptism by Death.text: You will track down a powerful Death Bishop who will drop a unique item when slain.

Battle Hardened.objective: Kill Tyrant in Colonnade Map while holding "Iron Heart (Crusader Plate)".
Battle Hardened.reward: Upgrades "Iron Heart (Crusader Plate)" to "The Iron Fortress (Crusader Plate)" upon completion.
Battle Hardened.text: You will defeat Tyrant while holding Iron Heart.

Beyond Sight I.objective:
You will slay the Bameth Cultists. Objective does not appear on map. The Cultists seem to spawn anywhere, confirmed location are:

* The Docks
* The Sewers
* The Ebony Barracks
* The Torched Courts
* The Aqueduct
* The Chamber of Innocence
* The Desecrated Chambers
* Prisoner's Gate (Act 6)
* The Blood Aqueduct
* The Lord's Labyrinth
* The Belly of the Beast Level 2
* "Lookout Map"
* "Lighthouse Map"
* "Arid Lake Map"
* "Strand Map"
Beyond Sight I.text: You will slay the cultists and the foes they summon.

Beyond Sight II.objective:
You will slay the Bameth Cultists. Note: Confirmed spawn areas for the Cultists are:
* The Chamber of Sins Level 1
* The Chamber of Sins Level 2
* The Crypt Level 1
* The Crypt Level 2
* The Crypt (Act 7)
* The Blood Aqueduct
* Necropolis Map
* Shrine Map
Beyond Sight II.text: You will slay the cultists and the powerful foes they summon.

Beyond Sight III.objective: You will encounter monsters near a large shrine. You will activate that shrine.
Beyond Sight III.text: You will slay the cultists and the powerful foes they summon.

Beyond Sight IV.objective: Kill the Bameth Cultists and Herald of Bameth
Beyond Sight IV.text: You will slay the Herald of Bameth and the very powerful foe it summons.

Black Devotion.objective: Kill Litanius, the Black Prayer in Relic Chambers Map while holding "Geofri's Baptism (Brass Maul)".
Black Devotion.reward: Upgrades "Geofri's Baptism (Brass Maul)" to "Geofri's Devotion (Brass Maul)" upon completion.
Black Devotion.text: You will defeat Litanius, the Black Prayer while holding Geofri's Baptism.

Blind Faith.objective: Kill Barthol, the Pure in "Haunted Mansion Map" while holding a "The Ignomon (Gold Amulet)".
Blind Faith.reward: Upgrades "The Ignomon (Gold Amulet)" to "The Effigon (Gold Amulet)" upon completion.
Blind Faith.text: You will defeat Barthol, the Pure while holding The Ignomon.

Blinding Light.objective: Kill Jorus, Sky's Edge in Temple Map while holding "Eclipse Solaris (Crystal Wand)".
Blinding Light.reward: Upgrades "Eclipse Solaris (Crystal Wand)" to "Corona Solaris (Crystal Wand)" upon completion.
Blinding Light.text: You will defeat Jorus, Sky's Edge while holding Eclipse Solaris.

Blood in the Eyes (prophecy).objective:
Kill a rare Mad Gladiator. Suitable locations are:
* Map - Arena
* Map - Racecourse
Blood in the Eyes (prophecy).reward: Mad Gladiator will drop "The Bringer of Rain (Nightmare Bascinet)" upon slaying.
Blood in the Eyes (prophecy).text: You will track down a powerful Mad Gladiator in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

Blood of the Betrayed.objective:
Kill a rare Kaom's Chosen in one of the following locations:
* "Caldera Map"
Blood of the Betrayed.reward: Kaom's Chosen will drop "Hezmana's Bloodlust (Vaal Axe)" upon slaying.
Blood of the Betrayed.text: You will track down a powerful Kaom's Chosen in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

Bountiful Traps.reward: The location contains six extra strongboxes.
Bountiful Traps.text: You will enter a map that holds six additional Strongboxes.

Brothers in Arms.objective: Kill Kole and Brutus in the Upper Prison (Act 1).
Brothers in Arms.text: You will encounter Brutus and Kole deep in Axiom Prison, and slay them both.

Burning Dread.objective: Kill Piety the Empyrean in "Shrine Map" while wearing a "Dreadarc (Cleaver)".
Burning Dread.text: You will defeat Piety the Empyrean while holding Dreadarc.

Cleanser of Sins.objective:
Kill a rare Undying Evangelist in one of the following locations:
* Act 3 - The Sceptre of God
* Act 3 - The Upper Sceptre of God
* Act 8 - The Grand Promenade
Cleanser of Sins.reward: Undying Evangelist will drop "Tabula Rasa (Simple Robe)" upon slaying.
Cleanser of Sins.text: You will track down a powerful Undying Evangelist who will drop a unique item when slain.

Cold Blooded Fury.objective: Kill Glace in Beach Map while holding "Bloodboil (Coral Ring)".
Cold Blooded Fury.reward: Upgrades "Bloodboil (Coral Ring)" to "Winterweave (Coral Ring)" upon completion.
Cold Blooded Fury.text: You will defeat Glace while holding Bloodboil.

Cold Greed.objective: Kill Fragment of Winter in Waterways Map while holding "Cameria's Maul (Gavel)".
Cold Greed.reward: Upgrades "Cameria's Maul (Gavel)" to "Cameria's Avarice (Gavel)" upon completion.
Cold Greed.text: You will defeat Fragment of Winter while holding Cameria's Maul.

Crimson Hues.objective: Kill Visceris in Overgrown Ruin Map while holding "Goredrill (Skinning Knife)".
Crimson Hues.reward: Upgrades "Goredrill (Skinning Knife)" to "Sanguine Gambol (Skinning Knife)" upon completion.
Crimson Hues.text: You will defeat Visceris while holding Goredrill.

Crushing Squall.objective: Prophecy completes upon entering an area. Area will contain a Tempest.
Crushing Squall.reward: Areas with this prophecy active have 30% increased item quantity and rarity.
Crushing Squall.text: You will discover an area with a Crushing Tempest

Custodians of Silence.objective:
Kill a rare Assault Ribbon in one of the following locations:
* Act 3 - The Battlefront
* Act 3 - The Solaris Temple Level 1
* Act 3 - The Solaris Temple Level 2
* Act 8 - The Imperial Fields
* Act 8 - The Solaris Concourse
* Act 8 - The Lunaris Concourse
* Act 8 - The Solaris Temple Level 1
* Act 8 - The Solaris Temple Level 2
* Act 8 - The Lunaris Temple Level 1
* Act 8 - The Lunaris Temple Level 2
* Act 8 - The Harbour Bridge
Custodians of Silence.reward: Assault Ribbon will drop "Tear of Purity (Lapis Amulet)" upon slaying.
Custodians of Silence.text: You will track down a powerful Assault Ribbon who will drop a unique item when slain.

Dance of Steel.objective: Kill The Steel Soul in Arsenal Map while holding "The Dancing Dervish (Reaver Sword)".
Dance of Steel.reward: Upgrades "The Dancing Dervish (Reaver Sword)" to "The Dancing Duo (Reaver Sword)" upon completion.
Dance of Steel.text: You will defeat The Steel Soul while holding The Dancing Dervish.

Dark Instincts.objective: Kill Arakaali, Spinner of Shadows in The Temple of Decay Level 2 in Act 7 while holding "Foxshade (Wild Leather)".
Dark Instincts.reward: Upgrades "Foxshade (Wild Leather)" to "Fox's Fortune (Wild Leather)" upon completion.
Dark Instincts.text: You will defeat Arakaali, Spinner of Shadows while holding Foxshade.

Darktongue's Shriek.objective: Kill Doedre the Defiler in Sepulchre Map while holding "Windscream (Reinforced Greaves)".
Darktongue's Shriek.reward: Upgrades "Windscream (Reinforced Greaves)" to "Windshriek (Reinforced Greaves)" upon completion.
Darktongue's Shriek.text: You will defeat Doedre the Defiler while holding Windscream.

Day of Sacrifice I.objective:
Kill a rare Vaal Fallen in one of the following locations:
* Vaal side area
* Act 2 - The Vaal Ruins
* Act 7 - The Causeway
* "Burial Chambers Map"
* "The Apex of Sacrifice" 
* "The Alluring Abyss"
Day of Sacrifice I.reward: The slain Vaal Fallen will drop a "Sacrifice at Dawn" fragment.
Day of Sacrifice I.text: You will slay a powerful Vaal Fallen who will drop a Sacrifice at Dawn fragment.

Day of Sacrifice II.reward: The strongbox contains a "Sacrifice at Noon" fragment.
Day of Sacrifice II.text: You will open a corrupted rare strongbox that will contain a Sacrifice at Noon fragment.

Day of Sacrifice III.objective: Enter a difficult Vaal side area.
Day of Sacrifice III.reward: The Vaal Vessel contains an additional "Sacrifice at Dusk" fragment.
Day of Sacrifice III.text: You will enter a difficult Vaal side area that contains an additional Sacrifice at Dusk fragment.

Day of Sacrifice IV.objective: Kill a rare monster in any rare corrupted map.
Day of Sacrifice IV.reward: The monster drops a "Sacrifice at Midnight".
Day of Sacrifice IV.text: You will encounter an invading foe in a rare, corrupted map, who will drop a Sacrifice at Midnight fragment.

Deadly Rivalry I.objective: Enter a random area. A rogue exile will spawn with a nemesis mod.
Deadly Rivalry I.text: You will encounter a rival Exile imbued with Nemesis powers.

Deadly Rivalry II.objective: Enter a random area. A rogue exile will spawn with a onslaught mod.
Deadly Rivalry II.text: You will encounter the rival Exile, now also imbued with Onslaught.

Deadly Rivalry III.objective: Enter a random area. A rogue exile will spawn possessed by a tormented spirit.
Deadly Rivalry III.text: You will encounter the rival Exile, now possessed by a Tormented Spirit.

Deadly Rivalry IV.objective: Enter a random area. A rogue exile will spawn buffed by a shrine.
Deadly Rivalry IV.text: You will encounter the rival Exile, now imbued with the powers of a Shrine

Deadly Rivalry V.objective: Enter a random area. A rogue exile will spawn with all previous mods (nemesis, onslaught, shrine, tormented spirit) along with a group of casual rogue exiles.
Deadly Rivalry V.text: You will encounter the rival Exile, now backed by others of a shared Bloodline.

Deadly Twins.objective:
Enter any map which will contain doubled map bosses.
'''Note:''' This prophecy can not trigger in map with the Twinned prefix.
Deadly Twins.text: You will enter a map and slay the Twinned bosses in it.

Defiled in the Sceptre.objective: Kill the mobbetter source needed] in The Upper Sceptre of God by the central corpse lift.
Defiled in the Sceptre.text: You will encounter a group of strong miscreations in the Upper Sceptre of God, and slay them all.

Dying Cry.objective: Kill General Gravicius in The Ebony Barracks while wearing a "Deidbell (Gilded Sallet)".
Dying Cry.reward: Upgrades "Deidbell (Gilded Sallet)" to "Deidbellow (Gilded Sallet)" upon completion.
Dying Cry.text: You will defeat General Gravicius while holding Deidbell.

Echoes of Lost Love.objective: Destroy the Echo of Daresso in the Cavern of Anger (Act 1).
Echoes of Lost Love.text: You will find the Echo of Daresso in the Cavern of Anger and destroy it.

Echoes of Mutation.objective: Destroy the Echo of Maligaro in Chamber of Sins Level 2 (Act 2). It is found in the same room as Fidelitas, the Mourning.
Echoes of Mutation.text: You will find the Echo of Maligaro in the Chamber of Sins and destroy it.

Echoes of Witchcraft.objective: Destroy the Echo of Doedre Darktongue in The Western Forest (Act 2).
Echoes of Witchcraft.text: You will travel to the stone circle in the Western Forest, and destroy the Echo of Doedre Darktongue who waits there.

End of the Light.objective: Kill Tsoagoth, The Brine King in The Brine King's Reef in Act 6 while holding "Icetomb (Latticed Ringmail)".
End of the Light.reward: Upgrades "Icetomb (Latticed Ringmail)" to "Crystal Vault (Latticed Ringmail)" upon completion.
End of the Light.text: You will defeat Tsoagoth, The Brine King while holding Icetomb.

Ending the Torment.objective: Defeat a rare monster. A random Tormented Spirit will spawn.
Ending the Torment.text: You will slay a powerful foe who will release a Tormented Spirit.

Erased from Memory.text: You will slay a very powerful foe and it will drop an Orb of Scouring.

Erasmus' Gift.reward: The skill gem will have 20% quality.
Erasmus' Gift.text: You will discover a 20% quality gem.

Faith Exhumed.objective: Kill Tolman, the Exhumer in Mausoleum Map while holding "Chober Chaber (Great Mallet)".
Faith Exhumed.reward: Upgrades "Chober Chaber (Great Mallet)" to "Chaber Cairn (Great Mallet)" upon completion.
Faith Exhumed.text: You will defeat Tolman, the Exhumer while holding Chober Chaber.

Fallow At Last.objective: Go to the house ruins located west of the waypoint of The Crossroads (Act 2). You may need to stand in the house to trigger the event.
Fallow At Last.text: You will fight waves of risen farmers amongst the ruins of a house in Crossroads.

Fated Connections.objective: Use "Jeweller's Orb" on any body armour or two-handed weapon until it becomes six-socketed.
Fated Connections.text: You will create a fully-linked six-socket item using only Jeweller's Orbs.

Fear's Wide Reach.objective:
Kill a rare Devourer in one of the following locations:
* Act 2 - The Northern Forest
* Act 2 - The Caverns
* Act 3 - The Imperial Gardens
* Act 3 - The Hedge Maze
* Act 7 - The Northern Forest
* Act 8 - The Imperial Fields
Fear's Wide Reach.text: You will track down a powerful Devourer who will drop a unique item when slain.

Fire and Brimstone.objective: Kill Hatebeat in The Crematorium while holding a "Blackgleam (Fire Arrow Quiver)".
Fire and Brimstone.reward: Upgrades "Blackgleam (Fire Arrow Quiver)" to "The Signal Fire (Fire Arrow Quiver)" upon completion.
Fire and Brimstone.text: You will defeat Hatebeat while holding Blackgleam.

Fire and Ice.objective: Kill Hailrake in The Tidal Island while holding a "Hrimsorrow (Goathide Gloves)".
Fire and Ice.reward: Upgrades "Hrimsorrow (Goathide Gloves)" to "Hrimburn (Goathide Gloves)" upon completion.
Fire and Ice.text: You will defeat Hailrake while holding Hrimsorrow.

Fire from the Sky.objective: Prophecy completes upon entering an area. Area will contain a Tempest.
Fire from the Sky.reward: Areas with this prophecy active have 30% increased item quantity and rarity.
Fire from the Sky.text: You will discover an area with an Infernal Tempest

Fire, Wood and Stone.objective: Kill a rare Cinder Elemental in a map.
Fire, Wood and Stone.reward: Cinder Elemental will drop "Marohi Erqi (Karui Maul)" upon slaying.
Fire, Wood and Stone.text: You will track down a powerful Cinder Elemental in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

Flesh of the Beast.objective:
Kill a rare Bonewarped Warrior. Confirmed spawn area and map of the monster are:
* Act 4 - The Belly of the Beast Level 1
* Act 4 - The Belly of the Beast Level 2
* Act 4 - The Harvest
* Act 9 - The Quarry
* Act 9 - The Belly of the Beast
* "Phantasmagoria Map"
Flesh of the Beast.reward: Bonewarped Warrior will drop "Belly of the Beast (Full Wyrmscale)" upon slaying.
Flesh of the Beast.text: You will track down a powerful Bonewarped Warrior who will drop a unique item when slain.

Forceful Exorcism.objective: Kill a possessed monster. The Tormented Spirit will respawn.
Forceful Exorcism.text: You will kill a foe possessed by a Tormented Spirit, freeing the spirit.

From Death Springs Life.objective:
Kill a rare Dripping Dead in one of the following locations:
* Act 1 - The Mud Flats
* Act 1 - The Fetid Pool
* Act 1 - The Submerged Passage
* Act 1 - The Flooded Depths
From Death Springs Life.reward: Dripping Dead will drop "Lifesprig (Driftwood Wand)" upon slaying.
From Death Springs Life.text: You will track down a powerful Dripping Dead who will drop a unique item when slain.

From The Void.objective: Kill Bameth, a unique Beyond Demon, while wearing a "Blackheart (Iron Ring)", or have it in the inventory of the player character.
From The Void.reward: Upgrades "Blackheart (Iron Ring)" to "Voidheart (Iron Ring)" upon completion.
From The Void.text: You will defeat Bameth while holding Blackheart.

Gilded Within.reward: The monster will drop an additional rare item.
Gilded Within.text: You will slay a powerful foe and it will drop a rare item.

Golden Touch.objective: Use an "Orb of Transmutation" on any normal item (except flasks).
Golden Touch.reward: The item will turn into rare with 3 random modifiers.
Golden Touch.text: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on an item and it will grant extra mods.

Graceful Flames.objective:
Kill a rare Flame Sentinel in one of the following locations:
* Act 3 - The Battlefront
* Act 3 - The Solaris Temple Level 1
* Act 3 - The Solaris Temple Level 2
* Act 8 - The Imperial Fields
* Act 8 - The Solaris Concourse
* Act 8 - The Solaris Temple Level 1
* Act 8 - The Solaris Temple Level 2
* Act 8 - The Harbour Bridge
Graceful Flames.reward: Flame Sentinel will drop "Goldrim (Leather Cap)" upon slaying.
Graceful Flames.text: You will track down a powerful Flame Sentinel who will drop a unique item when slain.

Greed's Folly.objective: Kill Guardian of the Vault in Vault Map while holding "Wondertrap (Velvet Slippers)".
Greed's Folly.reward: Upgrades "Wondertrap (Velvet Slippers)" to "Greedtrap (Velvet Slippers)" upon completion.
Greed's Folly.text: You will defeat Guardian of the Vault while holding Wondertrap.

Heart of the Fire.objective:
Kill a rare Solar Guard in one of the following locations:
* Act 8 - The Solaris Concourse
* Act 8 - The Solaris Temple Level 1
* Act 8 - The Solaris Temple Level 2
* Act 8 - The Harbour Bridge
Heart of the Fire.reward: Solar Guard will drop "Sire of Shards (Serpentine Staff)" upon slaying.
Heart of the Fire.text: You will track down a powerful Solar Guard who will drop a unique item when slain.

Heavy Blows.objective: Kill Gneiss in The Old Fields while wearing a "Craghead (Serrated Arrow Quiver)".
Heavy Blows.reward: Upgrades "Craghead (Serrated Arrow Quiver)" to "Cragfall (Serrated Arrow Quiver)" upon completion.
Heavy Blows.text: You will defeat Gneiss while holding Craghead

Hidden Reinforcements.objective: Defeat a random monster. 10 uncommon Oak's Devoted bandits will spawn around your character.
Hidden Reinforcements.text: You will be ambushed by several enemies upon slaying a foe.

Hidden Vaal Pathways.objective: Spawns a Corrupted Zone in the eligible area you enter.
Hidden Vaal Pathways.text: You will enter a hidden Vaal area that contains powerful enemies.

Holding the Bridge.objective: Go the Ebony Barracks bridge (Act 3) to the south of the waypoint. Blackguard of Hatred and Blackguard of Wraith will spawn next to the bridge.
Holding the Bridge.text: You will encounter and slay two powerful Blackguard captains near the Ebony Barracks bridge.

Hunter's Lesson.reward: You gain the monster's mods for 60 seconds. The effect is similar to "Headhunter (Leather Belt)" but lasts longer and only once per prophecy.
Hunter's Lesson.text: You will slay a powerful foe and gain its powers.

Ice from Above.objective: Prophecy completes upon entering an area. Area will contain a Tempest.
Ice from Above.reward: Areas with this prophecy active have 30% increased item quantity and rarity.
Ice from Above.text: You will discover an area with an Arctic Tempest

In the Grasp of Corruption.objective: Go to the left of the tower entrance in Imperial Gardens (Act 3).  Captain of the Damned will spawn.
In the Grasp of Corruption.text: You will encounter a powerful undead Blackguard in the Imperial Gardens.

Kalandra's Craft.reward: The monster will drop a rare item and three mirrored copies of that same item.
Kalandra's Craft.text: You will slay a foe who drops four identical rare items.

Last of the Wildmen.objective: Kill Master of the Blade in Strand Map while holding "Briskwrap (Strapped Leather)".
Last of the Wildmen.reward: Upgrades "Briskwrap (Strapped Leather)" to "Wildwrap (Strapped Leather)" upon completion.
Last of the Wildmen.text: You will defeat Master of the Blade while holding Briskwrap.

Lasting Impressions.text: You will read something written long ago.

Lightning Falls.objective: Prophecy completes upon entering an area. Area will contain a Tempest.
Lightning Falls.reward: Areas with this prophecy active have 30% increased item quantity and rarity.
Lightning Falls.text: You will discover an area with an Electrocuting Tempest

Living Fires.objective: Go to the The Coast (Act 1) near Fire Fury. A unique Volcanic Golem will spawn.
Living Fires.text: You will discover a powerful fire golem at Fire Fury's camp in The Coast.

Lost in the Pages.objective: Kill a rare Undying Archivist in a map.
Lost in the Pages.reward: Undying Archivist will drop "Astramentis (Onyx Amulet)" upon slaying.
Lost in the Pages.text: You will track down a powerful Undying Archivist in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

Monstrous Treasure.objective: Go to a map area. The area contain 36 strongboxes where all non fixed-placed monsters are packed into.'''Note:''' This prophecy stacks with Zana's ambush mod.
Monstrous Treasure.text: You will travel to a map where the monsters lie in wait, open the boxes they guard, and slay them all.

Mouth of Horrors.objective: Kill Doedre in The Harvest (Act 4) while equipped with "Chalice of Horrors (War Buckler)" or carrying it in inventory.
Mouth of Horrors.reward: Upgrades "Chalice of Horrors (War Buckler)" to "Thirst for Horrors (War Buckler)" upon completion.
Mouth of Horrors.text: You will defeat Doedre while holding Chalice of Horrors.

Mysterious Invaders (Chaos).objective: Enter a map area. It will contain a random beyond demon that deals chaos damage.
Mysterious Invaders (Chaos).text: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.

Mysterious Invaders (Cold).objective: Enter a map area. It will contain a random beyond demon that deals cold damage.
Mysterious Invaders (Cold).text: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.

Mysterious Invaders (Fire).objective: Enter a map area. It will contain a random beyond demon that deals fire damage.
Mysterious Invaders (Fire).text: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.

Mysterious Invaders (Lightning).objective: Enter a map area. It will contain a random beyond demon that deals lightning damage.
Mysterious Invaders (Lightning).text: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.

Mysterious Invaders (Physical).objective: Enter a map area. It will contain a random beyond demon that deals physical damage.
Mysterious Invaders (Physical).text: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.

Nature's Resilience.objective: Kill Calaf, Headstaver in The Crossroads while wielding a "Springleaf (Plank Kite Shield)".
Nature's Resilience.reward: Upgrades "Springleaf (Plank Kite Shield)" to "The Oak (Plank Kite Shield)" upon completion.
Nature's Resilience.text: You will defeat Calaf, Headstaver while holding Springleaf.

Nemesis of Greed.objective: Kill a rare monster with a Inner Treasure Nemesis modifier.
Nemesis of Greed.reward: The monster will drop a second unique item.
Nemesis of Greed.text: You will slay a rare but powerful foe who then drops two unique items instead of one.

Notched Flesh.objective:
Kill a rare Pocked Mason, which could be found in one of the following locations:
* Act 9 - The Tunnel
* Act 9 - The Quarry
Notched Flesh.reward: Pocked Mason will drop "Infractem (Decimation Bow)" upon slaying.
Notched Flesh.text: You will track down a powerful Pocked Mason who will drop a unique item when slain.

Overflowing Riches.reward: The monster will drop ten random currency orbs upon slaying.
Overflowing Riches.text: You will slay a foe who erupts into currency.

Path of Betrayal.objective: Find a Weathered Carving. Kill the spawning Karui Spirits.
Path of Betrayal.text: You will encounter Karui Spirits near Weathered Carvings, and send them back to Hinekora.

Plague of Frogs.objective: Kill all frogs in an outdoor location.
Plague of Frogs.text: You will discover an outdoor location flooded with frogs.

Plague of Rats.objective: Kill all rats in an indoor location.
Plague of Rats.text: You will discover a series of indoor chambers flooded with rats.

Pleasure and Pain.objective: Kill Shavronne in The Harvest while wearing a "Crown of Thorns (Vine Circlet)".
Pleasure and Pain.reward: Upgrades "Crown of Thorns (Vine Circlet)" to "Martyr's Crown (Vine Circlet)" upon completion.
Pleasure and Pain.text: You will defeat Shavronne while holding Crown of Thorns.

Pools of Wealth.objective: Go to The Cavern of Anger in Act 1 in the same room as Merveil, the Siren and kill four Bubbling Gold.
Pools of Wealth.text: You will encounter and slay golden elementals deep in the Cavern of Anger.

Possessed Foe.objective: Find a Unique monster that will be possessed by a random Tormented Spirit. Map bosses are often affected, since there are usually only a few unique monsters in a map. Notably, this prophecy can also trigger for special bosses like Atziri, potentially making the fight far more difficult.
Possessed Foe.text: You will encounter one or more very powerful monsters possessed by a Tormented Spirit.

Power Magnified.objective: Kill Piety in The Lunaris Temple Level 2 while holding a "Reverberation Rod (Spiraled Wand)". Note: holding means equipping or having the gear in the player inventory
Power Magnified.reward: Upgrades "Reverberation Rod (Spiraled Wand)" to "Amplification Rod (Spiraled Wand)" upon completion.
Power Magnified.text: You will defeat Piety while holding Reverberation Rod

Rebirth.objective: Kill a normal monster. It will be revived as a rare monster with a nemesis mod.
Rebirth.text: You will slay a normal foe, who will be resurrected and granted new power.

Reforged Bonds.objective: You will kill a pack of monsters with a Bloodline.

Resistant to Change.objective: Use an "Orb of Transmutation" on any normal ring, amulet or shield.
Resistant to Change.reward: The item will turn into magic with a resistance modifier.
Resistant to Change.text: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a ring, shield, or amulet, and it will gain resistances.

Risen Blood.objective: Upon defeating a rare enemy, a Fated Coagulate will spawn. It has a similar effect as Living Blood.
Risen Blood.text: You will kill a powerful monster, whose blood takes on a new form.

Roth's Legacy.objective:
Kill a rare Oak's Devoted in one of the following locations:
* Act 2 - The Wetlands
* Act 6 - The Wetlands
Roth's Legacy.reward: Oak's Devoted will drop "Roth's Reach (Recurve Bow)" upon slaying.
Roth's Legacy.text: You will track down a powerful Oak's Devoted who will drop a unique item when slain.

Severed Limbs.objective: Kill Hammerstorm in The Mines Level 2 while equipping a "Limbsplit (Woodsplitter)" or hiving the item in the player inventory.
Severed Limbs.text: You will defeat Hammerstorm while holding Limbsplit.

Smothering Tendrils.objective: Use an "Orb of Transmutation" on a normal map.
Smothering Tendrils.reward: The map will gain the of Smotheringof SmotheringSuffix20% increased Quantity of Items found in this Area15% increased Rarity of Items found in this AreaPlayers have 20% less Recovery Rate of Life and Energy Shield+15% Monster pack size suffix mod.
Smothering Tendrils.text: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a map and it will gain a smothering atmosphere.

Soil, Worms and Blood.objective: Defeat an unspecified amount of Undead enemies in The Fetid Pool, The Riverways, The Aqueduct.
Soil, Worms and Blood.text: You will discover an area with large packs of Undead monsters.

Song of the Sekhema.objective: Kill Garukhan, Queen of the Wind in The Quarry while holding a "Asenath's Mark (Iron Circlet)".
Song of the Sekhema.reward: Upgrades "Asenath's Mark (Iron Circlet)" to "Asenath's Chant (Iron Circlet)" upon completion.
Song of the Sekhema.text: You will defeat Garukhan, Queen of the Winds while holding Asenath's Mark.

Storm on the Horizon.objective:
Kill a rare Brittle Poacher in one of the following locations:
* Act 1 - The Lower Prison
* Act 1 - The Upper Prison
* Act 6 - The Beacon
* Act 9 - The Refinery
* Map - Cells
* Map - Chateau
* Map - Museum
* Abandoned Prison
Storm on the Horizon.reward: Brittle Poacher will drop "Storm Cloud (Long Bow)" upon slaying.
Storm on the Horizon.text: You will track down a powerful Brittle Poacher who will drop a unique item when slain.

Storm on the Reef.objective:
Kill a rare Brine Vassal in one of the following locations:
* Act 6 - The Brine King's Reef
Storm on the Reef.reward: Brine Vassal will drop "Moonbender's Wing (Tomahawk)" upon slaying.
Storm on the Reef.text: You will track down a powerful Brine Vassal who will drop a unique item when slain.

Strong as a Bull.objective:
Kill a rare Fighting Bull in one of the following locations:
* Act 4 - The Grand Arena
Strong as a Bull.reward: Fighting Bull will drop "Meginord's Girdle (Heavy Belt)" upon slaying.
Strong as a Bull.text: You will track down a powerful Fighting Bull who will drop a unique item when slain.

Sun's Punishment.objective: Kill Dawn, Harbinger of Solaris in The Solaris Temple Level 2 (Act 8) while wearing a "Sundance (Clasped Boots)".
Sun's Punishment.reward: Upgrades "Sundance (Clasped Boots)" to "Sunspite (Clasped Boots)" upon completion.
Sun's Punishment.text: You will defeat Dawn, Harbinger of Solaris while holding Sundance.

Thaumaturgical History I.objective: You will read Shavronne's Journal in The Upper Prison (Act 1). Tentacle Miscreations will be summoned.
Thaumaturgical History I.text: You will read Shavronne's Journal in the Warden's Quarters.

Thaumaturgical History II.objective: You will read Doedre's Proclamation in The Western Forest. Skeletons will be summoned.
Thaumaturgical History II.text: You will read Doedre's Proclamation in The Western Forest in Act 2.

Thaumaturgical History III.objective: You will inspect the Ancient Reverie Device in The Chamber of Sins Level 1 (Act 2). Skeletons will be summoned who use "Storm Call".
Thaumaturgical History III.text: You will inspect the Ancient Reverie Device in the Chamber of Sins.

Thaumaturgical History IV.objective: You will read Malachai's Dedication in The Harvest (area). Malachai's Laureate will be summoned.
Thaumaturgical History IV.reward: The "Ascent From Flesh (Chain Belt)" will drop.
Thaumaturgical History IV.text: You will read Malachai's Dedication in The Harvest.

The Aesthete's Spirit.objective: Enter the Warden's Chambers. A Shavronne Tormented Spirit will posses Brutus.
The Aesthete's Spirit.text: You will find the tormented spirit of Shavronne near Brutus. You will slay Brutus while he is possessed by her spirit.

The Alchemist.objective:
Kill any Undying Alchemist in one of the following locations:
* Act 3 - The Sewers
* Act 8 - Doedre's Cesspool (The Toxic Conduits)
* Map - Cells
* Map - Toxic Sewer
* Map - Shore (rare)
* Map - Channel (rare)
* Olmec's Sanctum
The Alchemist.text: You will slay an Undying Alchemist, and it will drop an Orb of Alchemy.

The Ambitious Bandit I.objective:
Kill the bandits in one of the following locations:
* Act 2 - The Den
* Act 2 - The Chamber of Sins Level 1
* Act 2 - The Chamber of Sins Level 2
* Act 2 - The Fellshrine Ruins
* Act 2 - The Crypt Level 1
* Act 2 - The Crypt Level 2
* Act 2 - The Weaver's Chambers
* Act 2 - The Northern Forest
* Act 2 - The Dread Thicket
The Ambitious Bandit I.text: You will encounter and slay bandits in an area where they do not ordinarily appear.

The Ambitious Bandit II.objective:
Kill the bandits in one of the following locations:
* Act 3 - The Marketplace
* "Port Map"
* "Arcade Map"
* "Bazaar Map"
The Ambitious Bandit II.text: You will encounter and slay bandits in the Marketplace.

The Ambitious Bandit III.objective: Kill the bandits in The Library.
The Ambitious Bandit III.reward: The last bandit drops "The Ascetic (Gold Amulet)".
The Ambitious Bandit III.text: You will encounter and slay bandits in the Library.

The Apex Predator.objective: Kill The Hundred Foot Shadow in The Aqueduct while wielding "The Screaming Eagle (Jade Hatchet)".
The Apex Predator.reward: Upgrades "The Screaming Eagle (Jade Hatchet)" to "The Gryphon (Jade Hatchet)" upon completion.
The Apex Predator.text: You will defeat the Hundred Foot Shadow while holding Screaming Eagle.

The Beautiful Guide.reward: Increases the map's quality to 20% with a single "Cartographer's Chisel".
The Beautiful Guide.text: You will greatly enhance the quality of a map with a single Cartographer's Chisel.

The Beginning and the End.objective: Kill Archbishop Geofri in The Crypt Level 2 while wielding a "Realmshaper (Iron Staff)".
The Beginning and the End.reward: Upgrades "Realmshaper (Iron Staff)" to "Realm Ender (Iron Staff)" upon completion.
The Beginning and the End.text: You will defeat Archbishop Geofri while holding Realmshaper.

The Bishop's Legacy.objective: Kill Pagan Bishop of Agony in Cursed Crypt Map while holding "Geofri's Crest (Great Crown)".
The Bishop's Legacy.reward: Upgrades "Geofri's Crest (Great Crown)" to "Geofri's Legacy (Great Crown)" upon completion.
The Bishop's Legacy.text: You will defeat Pagan Bishop of Agony while holding Geofri's Crest.

The Blacksmith (prophecy).objective:
Kill Hillock in one of the following locations:
* Act 1 - The Twilight Strand
The Blacksmith (prophecy).reward: Hillock will drop "The Anvil (Amber Amulet)" upon slaying.
The Blacksmith (prophecy).text: You will slay Hillock and he will drop a powerful item.

The Bloody Flowers Redux.objective: Kill Gemling Legionnaires in The Grain Gate (Act 8) while holding a "Ezomyte Peak (Iron Hat)".
The Bloody Flowers Redux.reward: Upgrades "Ezomyte Peak (Iron Hat)" to "Ezomyte Hold (Iron Hat)" upon completion.
The Bloody Flowers Redux.text: You will defeat the Gemling Legionnaires while holding Ezomyte Peak

The Bowstring's Music.objective: Kill Nightwane in The Dried Lake while holding a "Death's Harp (Death Bow)". (Note: holding means equipping or having that bow in the player inventory.)
The Bowstring's Music.reward: Upgrades "Death's Harp (Death Bow)" to "Death's Opus (Death Bow)" upon completion.
The Bowstring's Music.text: You will defeat Nightwane while holding Death's Harp.

The Brothers of Necromancy.objective:
Slay the four necromancers and their pack of undead minions, they might spawn in any of the following locations:
* Act 1 - The Coast
* Act 1 - The Mud Flats
* Act 1 - The Ship Graveyard
* Act 1 - The Ship Graveyard Cave
* Act 3 - The Marketplace
* Act 3 - The Catacombs
* Act 3 - The Library
* Act 3 - The Sceptre of God
* Act 4 - Kaom's Dream
* Act 4 - Kaom's Stronghold
* Act 4 - The Harvest
* "Cemetery Map"
* "Tropical Island Map"
The Brothers of Necromancy.text: You will encounter four necromancers with their undead minions and slay them all.

The Brutal Enforcer.objective:
Kill a rare Blackguard Elite in one of the following locations:
* Act 3 - The Crematorium
* Act 3 - The Battlefront
* Act 3 - The Ebony Barracks
* Act 3 - The Lunaris Temple Level 1
The Brutal Enforcer.reward: Blackguard Elite will drop "Facebreaker (Strapped Mitts)" upon slaying.
The Brutal Enforcer.text: You will track down a powerful Blackguard Elite who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Child of Lunaris.objective: Go to the right side of waypoint of The Crossroads (Act 2). The '''Child of Lunaris''' counts for the unique monster challenge.
The Child of Lunaris.text: Near the Crossroads, you will encounter the Child of Lunaris in the ruins of a temple, and slay it.

The Corrupt.objective: Kill a boss in a Vaal side area.
The Corrupt.text: You will slay a powerful enemy in a Vaal side area and it will drop a Vaal Orb.

The Cursed Choir.objective: Enter a random location. The area will be filled with Sea Witches.
The Cursed Choir.text: You will discover an area with large packs of Sea Witches.

The Dreaded Rhoa.objective: Kill Skullbeak in Bog Map while holding "Redbeak (Rusted Sword)".
The Dreaded Rhoa.reward: Upgrades "Redbeak (Rusted Sword)" to "Dreadbeak (Rusted Sword)" upon completion.
The Dreaded Rhoa.text: You will defeat Skullbeak while holding Redbeak.

The Dream Trial.reward: The location will contain a Trials of Ascendancy.
The Dream Trial.text: You will discover a Trial of Ascendancy in a map.

The Dreamer's Dream.objective: Enter a map via the Map Device.
The Dreamer's Dream.reward: The map boss will drop a rare map.
The Dreamer's Dream.text: You will enter a certain map, and when you slay the very powerful foe that has made it its home, it will drop a rare map.

The Eagle's Cry.reward: Murk Runner will drop "The Screaming Eagle (Jade Hatchet)" upon slaying.
The Eagle's Cry.text: You will track down a powerful Murk Runner who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Emperor's Trove.objective: Kill Izaro in The Lord's Labyrinth.
The Emperor's Trove.text: You will slay Izaro and he will drop an extra Treasure Key.

The Fall of an Empire.objective: Kill Shadow of the Vaal in Maze Map while holding "Quecholli (Jagged Maul)".
The Fall of an Empire.reward: Upgrades "Quecholli (Jagged Maul)" to "Panquetzaliztli (Jagged Maul)" upon completion.
The Fall of an Empire.text: You will defeat Shadow of the Vaal while holding Quecholli.

The Feral Lord I.objective: Find the Feral Lord's animals in the Southern Forest and slay them.
The Feral Lord I.text: You will encounter corrupted animals in the Southern Forest and slay them.

The Feral Lord II.objective: Find the Feral Lord's Beast in the Northern Forest and slay it.
The Feral Lord II.text: You will encounter a powerful beast in the Northern Forest and slay it.

The Feral Lord III.objective: Find the Feral Lord's corrupted animals in the Dried Lake, "Desert Map", "Wasteland Map" and slay them.
The Feral Lord III.text: You will encounter corrupted animals in the Dried Lake, [[Desert Map]], or [[Wasteland Map]] and slay them.

The Feral Lord IV.objective:
Kill the Feral Lord's vulture, Meritarus, in one of the following locations:
* Act 3 - The City of Sarn
* Act 8 - The Grand Promenade
* Act 8 - The Quay
* Act 8 - The High Gardenscitation needed]
* Act 8 - The Imperial Fieldscitation needed]
* Act 8 - The Harbour Bridgecitation needed]
* Act 8 - The Solaris Concourse
* Map - Arsenal
* Map - Colonnade
* Map - Ghetto
* Map - Precinct
* Map - Promenade
The Feral Lord IV.text: You will discover and slay a very powerful Vulture within Sarn's borders or Maps of Sarn.

The Feral Lord V.objective: You will find a Rhoa in a Mud Geyser Map which, when killed makes Yriel, the Feral Lord appear, who you have to defeat.
The Feral Lord V.reward: Yriel, the Feral Lord will drop "Yriel's Key" when defeated.
The Feral Lord V.text: You will discover and slay a very powerful fiery Rhoa in a Mud Geyser map.

The Flayed Man.objective:
Kill a rare Gut Flayer in one of the following locations:citation needed]
* Map - Academy
* Map - Arena
* Map - Bazaar
* Map - Cemetery
* Map - Villa
* Map - Pier
The Flayed Man.reward: Gut Flayer will drop "Bino's Kitchen Knife (Slaughter Knife)" upon slaying.
The Flayed Man.text: You will track down a powerful Gut Flayer in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Flow of Energy.objective: Kill Shavronne in The Harvest while holding a "Shavronne's Pace (Scholar Boots)".
The Flow of Energy.reward: Upgrades "Shavronne's Pace (Scholar Boots)" to "Shavronne's Gambit (Scholar Boots)" upon completion.
The Flow of Energy.text: You will defeat Shavronne while holding Shavronne's Pace.

The Forgotten Garrison.objective: Go to the The Broken Bridge (Act 2). A group of Undead Guardians will be standing in the ruined fortress.
The Forgotten Garrison.text: Near the Broken Bridge, you will encounter and slay an army of undead in the ruins of the fortress.

The Forgotten Soldiers.objective: Go to The Climb (Act 1). Animated Weapons will spawn around the flag.
The Forgotten Soldiers.text: You will encounter the risen weapons of a fallen army around Lioneye's Standard in The Climb.

The Fortune Teller's Collection.reward: The map will spawn a Fortune Teller's Chest that drops several divination cards.
The Fortune Teller's Collection.text: You will find a chest containing Divination Cards in a map.

The Four Feral Exiles.objective: Enter a map area. It will be filled with four random Rogue Exiles.
The Four Feral Exiles.text: You will enter a map that holds four additional Rogue Exiles.

The God of Misfortune.objective: Kill Kuduku and Kadaka in the Ledge.
The God of Misfortune.text: You will destroy the false idols Kuduku and Kadaka

The Great Leader of the North.objective: Kill Boulderback in The Foothills in Act 9 while holding "The Magnate (Studded Belt)".
The Great Leader of the North.reward: Upgrades "The Magnate (Studded Belt)" to "The Nomad (Studded Belt)" upon completion.
The Great Leader of the North.text: You will defeat Boulderback while holding The Magnate.

The Great Mind of the North.objective: Kill Hector Titucius, Eternal Servant in The Bath House in Act 8 while holding "The Magnate (Studded Belt)".
The Great Mind of the North.reward: Upgrades "The Magnate (Studded Belt)" to "The Tactician (Studded Belt)" upon completion.
The Great Mind of the North.text: You will defeat Hector Titucius, Eternal Servant while holding The Magnate.

The Hardened Armour.reward: Increases armour's quality to 20% with a single "Armourer's Scrap".
The Hardened Armour.text: You will greatly enhance the quality of an armour piece with a single Armourer's Scrap

The Hollow Pledge.objective:
Kill a rare Tunneler in one of the following locations:
* Map - Grotto
* Map - Quarry
* Map - Underground River
The Hollow Pledge.reward: Tunneler will drop "Pledge of Hands (Judgement Staff)" upon slaying.
The Hollow Pledge.text: You will track down a powerful Tunneler in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Hungering Swarm.objective: Enter any random area. It will filled with Carrion Queen and Carrion Minions.
The Hungering Swarm.text: You will discover an area with large packs of Insects.

The Invader.objective: An area contains a random invasion boss.
The Invader.text: You will encounter a very powerful invading monster and slay it.

The Jeweller's Touch.objective: Use a "Jeweller's Orb" on any body armour or two-handed weapon.
The Jeweller's Touch.reward: Item will become five sockets and five links. Socket colors will also be changed.
The Jeweller's Touch.text: You will create a fully-linked five-socket item with a single Jeweller's Orb

The Karui Rebellion.objective:
Kill the Gemling Legionnaires in The Grain Gate while holding a "Karui Ward (Jade Amulet)"
Holding means equipping the amulet or having the item in the inventory of the player character.
The Karui Rebellion.reward: Upgrades "Karui Ward (Jade Amulet)" to "Karui Charge (Jade Amulet)" upon completion.
The Karui Rebellion.text: You will defeat the Gemling Legionnaires while holding Karui Ward.

The King and the Brambles.objective: Kill Daresso in The Grand Arena while holding "Bramblejack (Plate Vest)".
The King and the Brambles.reward: Upgrades "Bramblejack (Plate Vest)" to "Wall of Brambles (Plate Vest)" upon completion.
The King and the Brambles.text: You will defeat Daresso while holding Bramblejack.

The King's Path.objective: Kill Kaom in Kaom's Stronghold while wearing a "Kaom's Sign (Coral Ring)".
The King's Path.reward: Upgrades "Kaom's Sign (Coral Ring)" to "Kaom's Way (Coral Ring)" upon completion.
The King's Path.text: You will defeat Kaom while holding Kaom's Sign.

The Lady in Black.objective:
Kill a rare Blackguard Arcmage in one of the following locations:
* Act 3 - The Ebony Barracks
* Act 3 - The Lunaris Temple Level 1
The Lady in Black.reward: Blackguard Arcmage will drop "Reverberation Rod (Spiraled Wand)" upon slaying.
The Lady in Black.text: You will track down a powerful Blackguard Arcmage who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Last Watch.objective:
Kill a rare Ancient Archer in one of the following locations:
* Act 1 - The Coast
* Act 1 - The Ledge
* Act 2 - The Fellshrine Ruins
The Last Watch.reward: Ancient Archer will drop "Drillneck (Penetrating Arrow Quiver)" upon slaying.
The Last Watch.text: You will track down a powerful Ancient Archer who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Lost Maps.objective: Enter the  The Chamber of Sins in Act 2 or Act 7.
The Lost Maps.reward: On enter, around 6 Tier 1 Maps of random Rarity will drop in the center near the Waypoint and map device.
The Lost Maps.text: You will find maps near the centre of the Chamber of Sins.

The Lost Undying.objective:
Kill a rare Skulking Dweller in one of the following locations:
* The Lord's Labyrinth
The Lost Undying.reward: Skulking Dweller will drop "Winds of Change (Ancient Gauntlets)" upon slaying.
The Lost Undying.text: You will track down a powerful Skulking Dweller who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Malevolent Witch.objective: Kill Erythrophagia in Phantasmagoria Map while holding "Doedre's Tenure (Velvet Gloves)".
The Malevolent Witch.reward: Upgrades "Doedre's Tenure (Velvet Gloves)" to "Doedre's Malevolence (Velvet Gloves)" upon completion.
The Malevolent Witch.text: You will defeat Erythrophagia while holding Doedre's Tenure.

The Mentor.objective: Kill The Cleansing Light in Basilica Map while holding "Matua Tupuna (Tarnished Spirit Shield)".
The Mentor.reward: Upgrades "Matua Tupuna (Tarnished Spirit Shield)" to "Whakatutuki o Matua (Tarnished Spirit Shield)" upon completion.
The Mentor.text: You will defeat The Cleansing Light while holding Matua Tupuna.

The Misunderstood Queen.objective: Kill The Bone Queen in The Belly of the Beast Level 1 while holding a "Queen's Decree (Ornate Sword)".
The Misunderstood Queen.reward: Upgrades "Queen's Decree (Ornate Sword)" to "Queen's Escape (Ornate Sword)" upon completion.
The Misunderstood Queen.text: You will defeat the Bone Queen while holding Queen's Decree.

The Mysterious Gift.objective: Sell five unique items to a vendor. (all at once)
The Mysterious Gift.reward: The vendor gives you a mystery box which transforms into a random unique item.
The Mysterious Gift.text: You will trade five unique items with a vendor.

The Nest.objective:
Kill a rare Noxious Tarantula in one of the following locations:
* "Arachnid Nest Map" 
* "Spider Lair Map" 
* "Primordial Blocks Map"
* "Residence Map"
* "Peninsula Map"
* "Spider Forest Map"
* "Jungle Valley Map"
The Nest.reward: Noxious Tarantula will drop "Rat's Nest (Ursine Pelt)" upon slaying.
The Nest.text: You will track down a powerful Noxious Tarantula in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Nightmare Awakens.objective: Kill Eater of Souls in Core Map while holding "Malachai's Simula (Iron Mask)".
The Nightmare Awakens.reward: Upgrades "Malachai's Simula (Iron Mask)" to "Malachai's Awakening (Iron Mask)" upon completion.
The Nightmare Awakens.text: You will defeat Eater of Souls while holding Malachai's Simula.

The Petrified.objective:
Kill a rare Pocked Lanternbearer in one of the following locations:
* Act 4 - The Mines Level 1
* Act 4 - The Mines Level 2
The Petrified.reward: Pocked Lanternbearer will drop "Twyzel (Sage Wand)" upon slaying.
The Petrified.text: You will track down a powerful Pocked Lanternbearer who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Plaguemaw I.objective: Defeat Eber's Colossus, a unique golem that appears upon killing the boss of a Vaal side area.
The Plaguemaw I.text: You will encounter a powerful golem in a Vaal side area and defeat it.

The Plaguemaw II.objective: Find the Plaguemaw's followers in the Crypt and slay them.
The Plaguemaw II.text: You will encounter shadowy monsters in the Crypt and slay them.

The Plaguemaw III.objective: Kill any unique monster causing the Plaguemaw's followers to appear.
The Plaguemaw III.text: You will be ambushed by the Plaguemaw's followers after you kill a certain very powerful monster.

The Plaguemaw IV.objective: Find the Plaguemaw's Offering, a unique Arcanist's strongbox, in the Imperial Gardens. Open it and defeat the ambushing monsters to complete the prophecy.
The Plaguemaw IV.text: You will be ambushed by the Plaguemaw's followers in the Imperial Gardens.

The Plaguemaw V.objective: Defeat Eber, the Plaguemaw, who can be found in a separate room within the Crystal Veins or a Crystal Ore Map.
The Plaguemaw V.reward: Eber, the Plaguemaw will drop "Eber's Key" when defeated. There is a chance to drop "Breath of the Council (Carnal Sceptre)".
The Plaguemaw V.text: You will enter the Plaguemaw's chamber in the Crystal Veins.

The Prison Guard.objective:
Kill a rare Axiom Thunderguard in one of the following locations:
* The Upper Prison (Act 1)
* The Chamber of Sins Level 2 (Act 2) 
* The Chamber of Sins Level 2 (Act 7) (to confirm)
* Vault Map (to confirm)
The Prison Guard.reward: Axiom Thunderguard will drop "Storm Prison (Carved Wand)" upon slaying.
The Prison Guard.text: You will track down a powerful Axiom Thunderguard who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Prison Key.objective:
Kill a rare Bearded Devil in one of the following locations:
* Act 1 - Prisoner's Gate
The Prison Key.reward: Bearded Devil will drop "Axiom Perpetuum (Bronze Sceptre)" upon slaying.
The Prison Key.text: You will track down a powerful Bearded Devil who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Queen's Sacrifice.objective: Kill Atziri, Queen of the Vaal in "The Alluring Abyss" while holding "Atziri's Mirror (Golden Buckler)".
The Queen's Sacrifice.reward: Upgrades "Atziri's Mirror (Golden Buckler)" to "Atziri's Reflection (Golden Buckler)" upon completion.
The Queen's Sacrifice.text: You will defeat Atziri, Queen of the Vaal in the Alluring Abyss while holding Atziri's Mirror.

The Queen's Vaults.objective:
Kill Atziri, Queen of the Vaal in one of the following locations:
* "The Apex of Sacrifice"
* "The Alluring Abyss"
* The Temple of Atzoatl
The Queen's Vaults.reward: Atziri, Queen of the Vaal will drop "Vaults of Atziri (Vaal Pyramid Map)" upon slaying.
The Queen's Vaults.text: You will slay Atziri, Queen of the Vaal, and gain access to her Vaults.

The Scout.reward: A group of warband monsters will spawn on the exiles death.
The Scout.text: You will encounter and slay a Rogue Exile, who calls forth a Warband.

The Servant's Heart.objective: Kill Fidelitas in The Chamber of Sins Level 2 (Act 2) while wielding a "Storm Cloud (Long Bow)" or have it in your player character inventory.
The Servant's Heart.reward: Upgrades "Storm Cloud (Long Bow)" to "The Tempest (Long Bow)" upon completion.
The Servant's Heart.text: You will defeat Fidelitas while holding Storm Cloud.

The Sharpened Blade.reward: Increases weapon's quality to 20% with a single "Blacksmith's Whetstone".
The Sharpened Blade.text: You will greatly enhance the quality of a weapon with a single Blacksmith's Whetstone.

The Silverwood.objective: Kill Targa, Beast Poacher in The Riverways while holding a "Silverbranch (Crude Bow)".
The Silverwood.reward: Upgrades "Silverbranch (Crude Bow)" to "Silverbough (Crude Bow)" upon completion.
The Silverwood.text: You will defeat Targa, Beast Poacher while holding Silverbranch.

The Singular Spirit.reward: Killed Tormented Spirit will drop a unique item.
The Singular Spirit.text: You will slay a Tormented spirit that carries a unique item.

The Sinner's Stone.objective:
Kill a rare Sin Lord in one of the following locations:
* Act 2 - The Chamber of Sins Level 2
* Act 2 - The Caverns
* Act 2 - The Ancient Pyramid
The Sinner's Stone.reward: Sin Lord will drop "Stone of Lazhwar (Lapis Amulet)" upon slaying.
The Sinner's Stone.text: You will track down a powerful Sin Lord who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Snuffed Flame.objective: Kill Chatters in The Lower Prison while holding a "Kaltenhalt (Painted Buckler)".
The Snuffed Flame.reward: Upgrades "Kaltenhalt (Painted Buckler)" to "Kaltensoul (Painted Buckler)" upon completion.
The Snuffed Flame.text: You will defeat Chatters while holding Kaltenhalt.

The Soulless Beast.objective:
Kill a rare Ancient Construct in one of the following locations:
* Act 2 - The Vaal Ruins
* Act 2 - The Caverns
* Act 2 - The Ancient Pyramid
* Act 7 - The Temple of Decay Level 2
* "The Apex of Sacrifice"
The Soulless Beast.reward: Ancient Construct will drop "Atziri's Foible (Paua Amulet)" upon slaying.
The Soulless Beast.text: You will track down a powerful Ancient Construct who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Stockkeeper.objective: Kill The Stockkeeper at The Grain Gate in Act 8. The Stockkeeper appears as Undying Outcast or an Undying Worker.
The Stockkeeper.reward: The Stockkeeper will drop a random unique item.
The Stockkeeper.text: You will encounter the Stockkeeper at the Grain Gate and slay him.

The Storm Spire.objective: Kill Poporo, the Highest Spire in Plateau Map while holding "The Stormheart (Royal Staff)".
The Storm Spire.reward: Upgrades "The Stormheart (Royal Staff)" to "The Stormwall (Royal Staff)" upon completion.
The Storm Spire.text: You will defeat Poporo, the Highest Spire while holding The Stormheart.

The Sword King's Passion.objective:
Kill a rare Mad Gladiator in one of the following locations:
* Act 4 - The Grand Arena
The Sword King's Passion.reward: Mad Gladiator will drop "Daresso's Passion (Estoc)" upon slaying.
The Sword King's Passion.text: You will track down a powerful Mad Gladiator who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Trembling Earth.objective: Enter a random area. It will be filled with many rare Devourers. The effect is similar to The ground beneath you tremors.
The Trembling Earth.text: You will discover an area with many Devourers.

The Twins (prophecy).objective: Enter a random area. The Rare monsters in the area get duplicated. The effect is similar to Prepared for trouble? How about double?.
The Twins (prophecy).text: You will encounter an area where powerful monsters are duplicated.

The Unbreathing Queen I.objective: Find and defeat the Unbreathing Queen's spectres in the Fellshrine Ruins in Act 2 or Act 7 near the church.
The Unbreathing Queen I.text: You will encounter spectres in the Fellshrine Ruins and slay them.

The Unbreathing Queen II.objective: Find and defeat Lora, The Contender in the first area of the Lord's Labyrinth.
The Unbreathing Queen II.text: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Lord's Labyrinth and defeat it.

The Unbreathing Queen III.objective: Defeat the Unbreathing Queen's spectre, who can be found at the top of the Beacon.
The Unbreathing Queen III.text: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Beacon and defeat it

The Unbreathing Queen IV.objective: Find and defeat the Unbreathing Queen's spectre in the Temple of Decay Level 1. The spectre may be on either of two floors in Level 1, but tends to be on the second floor near the back. Alternately, the spectre may be found in an Arachnid Tomb end-game map.
The Unbreathing Queen IV.text: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Temple of Decay and defeat it.

The Unbreathing Queen V.objective: Find and defeat Volkuur, the Unbreathing Queen in an area generated by a "Cemetery Map".
The Unbreathing Queen V.reward: Volkuur, the Unbreathing Queen drops "Volkuur's Key" when defeated.
The Unbreathing Queen V.text: You will defeat the Unbreathing Queen in a Cemetery map.

The Undead Brutes.objective: A group of 7 rare zombies spawns together in The Coast, The Catacombs, The Marketplace, The Battlefront, and The Sewers.
The Undead Brutes.text: You will seek out and destroy a group of seven powerful undead.

The Undead Storm.objective: Prophecy completes upon entering an area. Area will contain a Morbid Tempest.
The Undead Storm.reward: Areas with this prophecy active have 30% increased item quantity and rarity.
The Undead Storm.text: You will discover an area with a Morbid Tempest

The Vanguard.objective:
Kill a rare Voll's Vanguard in one of the following locations:
* Act 4 - The Dried Lake
* Act 9 - The Foothills
The Vanguard.reward: Voll's Vanguard will drop "Death's Harp (Death Bow)" upon slaying.
The Vanguard.text: You will track down a powerful Voll's Vanguard who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Walking Mountain.objective:
Kill a rare Ruined Titan. Confirmed spawn location of the monster are:
* Act 2 - The Old Fields
* Act 7 - The Ashen Fields
* "Lair Map"
The Walking Mountain.reward: Ruined Titan will drop "Clayshaper (Rock Breaker)" upon slaying.
The Walking Mountain.text: You will track down a powerful Ruined Titan who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Ward's Ward.objective:
Kill a rare Bearded Shaman in one of the following locations:
* Act 1 - Prisoner's Gate
* Act 2 - The Crossroads
The Ward's Ward.reward: Bearded Shaman will drop "Karui Ward (Jade Amulet)" upon slaying.
The Ward's Ward.text: You will track down a powerful Bearded Shaman who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Warmongers I.objective: You will encounter and slay several Warbands.
The Warmongers I.text: You will encounter and slay several Warbands.

The Warmongers II.objective: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their reinforcements.
The Warmongers II.text: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their reinforcements.

The Warmongers III.objective: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their elite soldiers.
The Warmongers III.text: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their elite soldiers.

The Warmongers IV.objective: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their leaders.
The Warmongers IV.reward: Each leader drops a unique of the corresponding warband.
The Warmongers IV.text: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their leader.

The Watcher's Watcher.objective:
Kill a rare Wandering Eye in one of the following locations:
* Act 4 - The Belly of the Beast Level 1
* Act 4 - The Belly of the Beast Level 2
* Act 4 - The Harvest
* Act 9 - The Belly of the Beast
* Underground River Map
The Watcher's Watcher.reward: Wandering Eye will drop "Eye of Chayula (Onyx Amulet)" upon slaying.
The Watcher's Watcher.text: You will track down a powerful Wandering Eye who will drop a unique item when slain.

The Wealthy Exile.reward: The exile's dropped items are all rare.
The Wealthy Exile.text: You will encounter and slay a Rogue Exile who wears only rare items.

Touched by the Wind.objective: Use an "Orb of Transmutation" on any normal pair of boots.
Touched by the Wind.reward: The item will turn into magic with a movement speed modifier.
Touched by the Wind.text: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a pair of boots and it will gain movement speed.

Trapped in the Tower.objective: Kill Caliga, Imperatrix in The Sceptre of God in Act 3 while holding "Fencoil (Gnarled Branch)".
Trapped in the Tower.reward: Upgrades "Fencoil (Gnarled Branch)" to "Mirebough (Gnarled Branch)" upon completion.
Trapped in the Tower.text: You will defeat Caliga, Imperatrix while holding Fencoil.

Trash to Treasure.objective: Use an "Orb of Chance" on any normal item.
Trash to Treasure.reward: The item will turn into unique.
Trash to Treasure.text: You will turn a normal item into a unique item with a single Chance Orb.

Twice Enchanted.objective: Complete the Labyrinth at any difficulty.
Twice Enchanted.reward: Grants two uses of the Enchantment device at the end of the Labyrinth.
Twice Enchanted.text: You will be rewarded with two uses of the Enchantment Device on completing the Labyrinth

Unbearable Whispers I.objective: Locate a Dark Tome in The Library. On activation, a pack of monsters will spawn.
Unbearable Whispers I.text: You will discover a tome in the Library.

Unbearable Whispers II.objective: Slay the unique monster Whisperer's Attendant on one of the floors in The Sceptre of God. There are three floors to The Sceptre of God, so make sure to check all of them.
Unbearable Whispers II.text: You will discover a tome upon slaying a monster in the Sceptre of God.

Unbearable Whispers III.objective:
Slay Shavronne in one of the following locations and destroy the dropped Tome.
* Shavronne of Umbra in The Harvest, Act 4
* Shavronne the Returned in Shavronne's Tower, Act 6
* Shavronne, Unbound in The Rotting Core, Act 9
* Liantra in Tower Map
* Shavronne in Cells Map
Unbearable Whispers III.text: You will slay Shavronne, and she will drop a tome.

Unbearable Whispers IV.objective: Kill a certain rare monster and the tome it drops to complete.
Unbearable Whispers IV.text: You will slay a certain powerful monster and it will drop a tome.

Unbearable Whispers V.objective: A Whispering Tome will be found in the Labyrinth Treasure Room. Kill Inya, the Unbearable Whispers, who will appear after the Dark Tome's defeat.
Unbearable Whispers V.reward: Inya, the Unbearable Whispers will drop "Inya's Key" when defeated.
Unbearable Whispers V.text: You will discover a dangerous tome in the final chamber of the Labyrinth.

Undead Uprising.objective: Go to The Old Fields (Act 2). The area boss will be Ember of the Past while all monsters are turned into skeletons.
Undead Uprising.text: You will travel to the Old Fields, where you will encounter and slay an army of the undead.

Unnatural Energy.objective: Enter The Battlefront (Act 3) and go south-west to the end of the bridge, which is around the "energy shield" barricade. There will spawn a giant Lightning Elemental, called Energy Aberration.
Unnatural Energy.text: You will encounter a powerful Lightning Elemental near the Battlefront bridge.

Vaal Invasion.objective: You must find and fight Echo of the Vaal, a smaller copy of Vaal Oversoul. All normal monsters are replaced by Vaal Enemies.
Vaal Invasion.text: You will find Vaal invaders in the Temple of Lunaris and destroy the monster who is leading them.

Vaal Winds.objective: Prophecy completes upon entering an area. Area will contain a Corrupting Tempest .
Vaal Winds.text: You will discover an area with a Corrupting Tempest

Visions of the Drowned.objective: Enter any zone that may contain loot-able corpses especially in Act 1 The Submerged Passage, The Coast, Tidal Island, The Ship Graveyard or The Ship Graveyard Cave. Corpses will be created in the zone which are turnable, like chests to create loot.
Visions of the Drowned.text: You will find an area littered with the drowned.

Vital Transformation.objective: Use an "Orb of Transmutation" on any normal ring or amulet.
Vital Transformation.reward: The item will turn into magic with a life modifier.
Vital Transformation.text: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a ring or amulet and it will gain a life mod.

Waiting in Ambush.objective: Open a strongbox. It will contain a random Rogue Exile.
Waiting in Ambush.text: You will be attacked by a Rogue Exile when opening a Strongbox.

Weeping Death.objective: Kill a rare Dripping Dead in a map.
Weeping Death.reward: Dripping Dead will drop "Rainbowstride (Conjurer Boots)" upon slaying.
Weeping Death.text: You will track down a powerful Dripping Dead in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

Wind and Thunder.objective:
Kill a rare Galvanic Ribbon in one of the following locations:
* Map - Arcade
* Map - Colonnade
* Map - Temple
* Map - Waste Pool
* Map - Defiled Cathedral
Wind and Thunder.reward: Galvanic Ribbon will drop "Windripper (Imperial Bow)" upon slaying.
Wind and Thunder.text: You will track down a powerful Galvanic Ribbon in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.

Winter's Mournful Melodies.objective: Kill Soulmourn in The Fellshrine Ruins (Act 2) while holding a "Hrimnor's Hymn (Sledgehammer)".
Winter's Mournful Melodies.reward: Upgrades "Hrimnor's Hymn (Sledgehammer)" to "Hrimnor's Dirge (Sledgehammer)" upon completion.
Winter's Mournful Melodies.text: You will defeat Soulmourn while holding Hrimnor's Hymn
